name: Cards against the rules
description:
Made for SURVIVE game jam 2022

Play a game of card against the AI! Be carefull the AI changes the rules every turn.

How to play?
Drag cards to play cards. Select the cards to attack the cards from the AI. You can only use army cards to perform an action.

Army: Knight, Archer, Spear, Monk

Buildings: Castle and Mine

Other: King
